content: this stocking is sparkly festive and fun to make i know this pattern might look a little intimidating because it has so much going on but i assure you it s actually pretty simple it s mostly double crochets and surprisingly quick to make since you only need a small amount of each yarn aside from the main color it s a great project for using up the ends of skeins that you have laying around **difficulty level ** intermediate **finished size ** 19 inches long **supplies ** ● worsted weight yarn in 6 colors approximately 120 yards of the main color and small amounts of the rest ● size h 5mm & f 4mm hooks ● yarn needle for finishing **terms of use ** you are welcome to sell any items you make using this pattern as long as you credit julie king / gleeful things & link to www gleefulthings com this pattern is protected by united states & international copyright law you may not sell or redistribute this pattern in part or in whole copyright © 2013 julie king / gleeful things all rights reserved
